basics.name: Colin Toomey
basics.label: Cybersecurity Professional
basics.summary: A German-born theoretical physicist, widely ranked among the greatest and most influential scientists of all time

work.name: Various Employers
work.summary: Over my college career I worked a variety of seasonal customer service positions in many fast paced environments. During my time at these roles I developed customer services skills, enhanced my communication skills and my ability to solve problems.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

education.institution: Genesee Community College, Batavia, New York

awards.title: President's List
awards.summary: To make it on SUNY Canton's President's List I earned over a 3.75 GPA during the Fall 2023 Semester.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: To make it on SUNY Canton's Dean's List I earned between a 3.25-3.75 GPA during the Spring 2023 Semester.

references.name: Professor Minhua Wang
references.reference: Professor Wang was my professor for many of my upper-level Cybersecurity courses at SUNY Canton.

projects.name: Encryption and Hashing Algorithm Web Application
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
